attributes.action: prevail upon Skybsb to reinstate its channels on cable and freeview
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Skybsb have withdrawn all channels from cable and intend to do the same on freeview soon. This restricts the choice of the viewing public as well as harming their own viewing figures with connotations for advertisers.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
